2.  The definition of “sexual relations” was crucial to the issue of whether
President Bill Clinton committed perjury. Find and distinguish the various
definitions of “sexual relations” at play in the following selection from
President Clinton’s testimony before the independent counsel, Kenneth
Starr, on August 17, 1998.6In your opinion, does either President Clinton
or the lawyers who are questioning him use definitions improperly? Why
or why not?
Q:  (BYMR.  BITTMAN):Mr.  President
